
* `from` (type: `Object`, required): 
  * `type` (type: `String`, required)
  * `field` (type: `String`, required)
* `to` (type: `Object`, required): 
  * `type` (type: `String`, required)
  * `field` (type: `String`, required)
* `scope` (type: `String (config | hoistValue)`)
* `composer` (type: `Any`)
* `name` (type: `String`)
